{{Description|The ever-pulsating heart of Liyue Harbor that pumps lifeblood into its veins. The lively city scene here is the source of Liyue Harbor's limitless vitality.|[[Archive]]}}

'''Chihu Rock''' is the southern part of [[Liyue Harbor]]'s lower areas. It is the lower-class district of the city, located on an island and connected via bridges to its surroundings: [[Feiyun Slope]] to the north and the road to the [[Golden House]] and [[The Chasm]] to the west.
